Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: prideful
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: This pawn is extremely vain and easily insulted.

li.label: prideful
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s sees [PAWN_objective]self as the natural leader of [PAWN_possessive] pride and as a consequence looks down on others and is easily offended.
